item.title: Hard Drive Failure Report Backblaze
item.description:
It gives us of which hard drive to buy and which not as they are one of the biggest buyer of hard-driver and see those working at scale.

As they mentioned Seagate ST16000NM001G has quite a high failure rate of 6.72% with backblaze so it would be wise to not buy that hard-drive.
